plot: Familiar radio voice Ben Grauer leads the viewer on a behind the scenes tour of the National Broadcasting Company studios, both in Rockefeller Center and Hollywood.
title: Behind Your Radio Dial
plot_es: Familiar radio voice Ben Grauer leads the viewer on a behind the scenes tour of the National Broadcasting Company studios, both in Rockefeller Center and Hollywood.
plot_en: Familiar radio voice Ben Grauer leads the viewer on a behind the scenes tour of the National Broadcasting Company studios, both in Rockefeller Center and Hollywood.
